1.1.name: wordpress/simple-popup-manager
1.1.description: If you want to promote your brand new newsletter functionnality, display advertising on your homepage or get more Facebook fans you can use Simple Popup Manager to "popup" a message all over your content in a lovely "lightbox effect". You can customize your message using a WP editor and of course specify the width and the height of the message box. You can limit the display off the message on either session or days basis.
